name: Grumpus
description:
This is a short original game by Jordan Grayson using an AI generated image as a prompt. Bennett Foddy fed a series of Neural Nets the string "a simmering, dissatisfied, disgruntled videogame" and this image was the output. I then used that image and string as inspiration for Grumpus. I hope you enjoy playing it! 

 

Author

The game design, art, programming, and sound effects for Grumpus were made by Jordan Grayson. The music was inspired by Robby Duguay but made by Jordan Grayson. This game was created during a one week period in Pico-8.
